website_summaries.verdict: Store spices on your cabinet doors with these attach-them-how-you-want-them clip strips.
pros: Six strips each have five clips for spice bottles
Clips can be detached for more flexibility
cons: Only good for round spice bottles
Oversize bottles may stretch the clips

customer_reviews.title: Looking good so far!
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty happy with them. They're solid. The adhesive seems to be VERY strong. I followed the instructions and did not put any weight on them for 48 hours. I also pressed them on well. I would have preferred to have all one color, white or black, but not bright red, but I did not see that option. I would have even been happy with Red, White, and Blue, because at least that gives the red a purpose. Regardless, my spice racks are filled (with regular sized bottled), saving me much room in the limited cabinet space I have, and equally important they are quick and easy to access.
customer_reviews.author: SARDOG52

customer_reviews.title: Great organizational product
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment so I didn't use the sticky back on the strips The strips came with a lot of screws that work great on my cabinet door. Now all of my spices are up where I can see them and I don't keep buying duplicates. Works well with all different sized bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Smith

customer_reviews.title: THE WHITE HOLDERS SEEM STURDIER THAN THE BLACK ONES, WHICH STARTED TO STRETCH OUT AFTER ONE DAY.
customer_reviews.text: REALLY LIKED THE IDEA OF USING THE INSIDE OF MY CABINETS FOR OUR SPICES. MAKES IT MUCH EASIER TO FIND WHAT WE NEED. MY ONLY COMPLAINT IS THAT THE BLACK HOLDERS ARE LESS STURDY THAN THE WHITE ONES. THE BLACK ONES STARTED TO STRETCH OUT IMMEDIATELY. NOT SURE IF I CAN GET EXTRA WHITE ONES TO CORRECT THIS ISSUE, BUT AM GOING TO TRY. ADHESION IS AMAZING!! All of the holders stretched out and spice containers fell out and shattered. I would not buy this product. Poorly mafe
customer_reviews.author: cristine dench

customer_reviews.title: A Simple Spacesaver
customer_reviews.text: These seem to do the job nicely, although I find having three different colors to deal with visually annoying. The strips would probably stay up without screws, but would rather not chance it. There's no adjusting once the sticky strip hits the surface. Tried the screws provided and they seemed a bit of overkill , so I used shorter ones and had an easier time of it. The way the holes in the strips are placed makes the screwing in a bit awkward, especially if you're doing it manually. A variety of jar styles fit quite easily. The plastic seems sturdy, but the strips have been in place for only a month, so we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: These clips work great. If you follow the instructions about how to ...
customer_reviews.text: These clips work great. If you follow the instructions about how to install them (clean the cabinet door first and then wait 24 hours before hanging something on them), you will have no problem with them coming undone. My only complaint is that I didn't consider the positioning of the inside cupboard shelves in my placement of the racks, so they don't look quite as symmetrical on my cupboard doors as they do in the demo picture of the product. (Otherwise the jars will crash into the shelves when the door is closed.)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: These clips have saved a lot of room in our cabinets! For the cost, you are provided with more than enough clips. So far they have been up almost 6 months and going strong. I would definitely purchase them again. The only negative thing I can say is for spices in glass jars: the glass seems almost too heavy. None have fallen out of the clip yet, but it seems close. The adhesive that came on them was also a surprise. Normally I have to buy double sided tape for "self-adhesive" products but, so far so good here!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha R.

customer_reviews.title: I love these but they keep falling off the cabinet door ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these but they keep falling off the cabinet door under the weight of the spices. I used the double sided tape that was included with them to attach them to my cabinet doors. There are holes provided in the them so that they can be nailed to the cabinet door, but I tried using a small nail and it started to come through the front of my oak cabinet door!!! So that was OUT.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Sticks great!
customer_reviews.text: These stick incredibly well and I didn't need to use the screws that came with it. I even messed up on the placement a few times and had to peel and and re-stick many of the clips. One tip I have is to not use too thick of spice jars. They may stretch out the clips and then it's hard to put smaller jars back in them. I'll see over time if they stretch out and lose their grip. For now, they are great and I'm not worried at all about the adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: Someone

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good... I cleaned the cabinet with alcohol wipe provided and stuck these on. didn't use screws because our cabinet doors aren't that thick and I didn't want to risk drilling through.. 2 weeks later everything is still up and hopefully it'll stay that way. If over time they fall off I'll either replace with my own double-side tape or will try the screws very slowly.
customer_reviews.author: cat e

customer_reviews.title: A great space saver and so easy a five-year-old can do it
customer_reviews.text: I think these are so wonderful and they have saved so much space. We have piles of spices jars. It was hard to find my desired bottle in the piles. I had two level circular spinning organizer and a three level stare rack but everything was always a mess. I put these up with my five-year-old and he did a great job sticking them on and putting the spices in. I now have two empty cupboards that I can put other things in. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: heidi ault

customer_reviews.title: Super creative solution
customer_reviews.text: This is SUCH a great idea! I have a set of shallow shelves on my wall, 4 shelves, but they were not enough. I set up these clips VERTICALLY running down the wood trim next to my spice shelves. I used 4 of the six clip-sets (each clipset has 5 spice-clips) and so it like having a 5th shelf. I am very happy I found these, because if I had not, I would have had to banish some of my spices to a cabinet where I'd probably forget about them,
customer_reviews.author: L. Grundy

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for flying objects
customer_reviews.text: They initially work great and adhesive is very strong, BUT the plastic holders don't always hold the jars well, especially if you remove one and place a thicker jar in its place. The next time you open the cabinet a little too quickly, the jar will come flying down and scare the $&(; out of you. Took mine down.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: A++++
customer_reviews.text: I love these!! I haven't mounted my glass jars yet. I'm a little afraid of that. But these have been up for over a month! So far, so good! Update: I have mounted my glass jars and they fit fine as long as you put them back in the right spot. Don’t put them in a spot that a wider jar was in because they will fall out when you open the cabinet. I learned the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: IneedAmazonRehab

customer_reviews.title: Great storage solution
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for back of the door storage. My door is hollow so I didn't screw the pieces in....instead I used more 3M tape (just put it on top of what is already on the back) to adhere it to the door. Allowed the tape 24 hours to "cure" and the put all my spices in. These won't hold larger spice bottles but will hold the standard ones you pick up at the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive solution for organizing our spices. We had used up the built-in spice rack in our cabinets and the rest were a jumble on the shelves making for inefficient use of space. We were considering a counter-top rack, but I thought for $10 it was worth trying these first. Stuck them inside the cabinet opposite the existing spice rack and filled it up. Working great so far, allowing us to use the shelves for other things, and keep the counter clear too.
customer_reviews.author: G. J. Gaspari

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME!!! Bought this for a chef friend of mine who's kitchen is the size of a small closet, so he has no counter space. He was so happy to finally have a place to add his spices. He couldn't have been happier! Also bought them for another friend who has a hunting cabin and he said they worked out perfectly for the limited space. Winner winner chicken dinner!
customer_reviews.author: Raster Disaster

customer_reviews.title: easy to install, work great
customer_reviews.text: These helped free up so much cabinet space. They don't interfere with what's inside and you can stack two or three depending on where your cabinet shelves are located. They hold all different kinds of spices from generic supermarket, trader joes, mccormick etc. with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Matt G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I used 2 in my kitchen and 2 in my bathroom for pill bottles. I gave the other 2 to my mom. Great item and easy to install. Haven't had issues with anything falling out and I have a variety of spice containers. Even a rectangular can of Old Bay fits in. These make things so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda83

customer_reviews.title: Great! But....
customer_reviews.text: IT's a great concept, and I loved it for the first month... but slowly my spices are falling out one by one and they are glass... so they have shattered a few times, or hit me in the face haha. I still LOVE the concept and haven't removed the rack... but I will have to do soon if it keeps breaking my little spice jars :(
customer_reviews.author: HaddyG

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but.....
customer_reviews.text: Although I like this product as it makes it easier to keep track of my spices, it isn't that great for glass bottles. They tend to fall out when the cupboard door is shut. They are great for the plastic container ( like McCormicks) and I'm try to find plastic containers like that to put the rest of my spices in.
customer_reviews.author: Raemar3356

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product but you definitely have to use spice and herb bottles that fit exactly in the holders. I had to buy new bottles to transfer several of my spices to containers that fit.
customer_reviews.author: B Retired

customer_reviews.title: So far I love these things
customer_reviews.text: So far I love these things! I put them on the outside of my cabinet and they've cleared up so much space in my cabinets. I didn't use any additional adhesive/screws/3M strips, just what is already attached. They have stuck so far, but it's only been a few days. Will update if it causes any problems.
customer_reviews.author: CSmith

customer_reviews.title: ... and never used them until now and they are amazing they do just what you want them to do ...
customer_reviews.text: ok so I purchased these a while ago and never used them until now and they are amazing they do just what you want them to do and they look great I receive so many compliments about them when people see them and they help keep my cabinet looking clean while I do not have to buy things over and over because I did see them in the back of the cabinet. Great Buy and I will be getting some more!!
customer_reviews.author: Tanisha Williams

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for a little while, but the clips eventually lost the ability to grip our larger, plastic spice jars. We have since removed the clips from the interior of our cabinet door and are in the process of looking for something to replace it with.
customer_reviews.author: cerealkiller11

customer_reviews.title: and free up a great deal of space in my tiny kitchen cupboard
customer_reviews.text: I am liking these spice container clips! They work well...so far, and free up a great deal of space in my tiny kitchen cupboard. They were easy to install, affordable, and abundant in quantity! If I need to replace an 'strips', I do have plenty of back ups! My only concern is their durability. I cook a lot - so we'll see how long they hold up. So far - so good! Good 'idea' product!!
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Dubois

customer_reviews.title: Great product that works as claimed!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the gripper strips up for about 2 weeks and they're working great! They were easy to install and are holding tightly onto the various, differently shaped spice bottles I've snapped into them.
customer_reviews.author: GingerRunner

customer_reviews.title: My needs were too tough for this product.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a rack with a bottom because motion shook the spices out. One location had a fat spice bottle placed in it for a few days and didn't recover to normal size after it was removed and a normal spice placed in the slot. Mounting was fine. Appearance was great. Price was fantastic. My needs were too tough.
customer_reviews.author: Carlile D. Crutcher

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and a great idea, but over time the cheap plastic no longer grips. Glass is especially bad. Plastic with a narrow neck is particularly good. I would love to find better quality at a higher price.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Fairchild

customer_reviews.title: ... purchase this knowing I can return it if I disliked it.
customer_reviews.text: I just got a tiny house so I looked everywhere for something to hold my all my spices and ultimately decided to purchase this knowing I can return it if I disliked it... And the result is, OMG I LOVE IT! I love that it doesn't destroy my inner cabinets with screws (they are included if needed) and it saves so much space in my cabinets for food and adult beverages ;) I can see all my spices at once and it can be hid inside the cabinets instead of outside. I am an avid Amazon Prime user and I never leave product reviews but this is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Linds

customer_reviews.title: I do like these. But
customer_reviews.text: I do like these. But, if you have a spice in each slot, and the bottles are a touch too big, they snap in well, and they tend to make the rack want to pull away from the cabinet. But if you install the screws they come with and not just the sticky strips, you should be okay.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Adhesive doesn't work, and I'm not going to drill into cabinets that aren't mine. I let it sit for 48 hours after thoroughly cleaning the surface before applying it, just like the instructions said, and woke up to the sound of my spices crashing to the floor in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Blow

customer_reviews.title: Very handy and useful.
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually using a few of these to hold some of my medicine and vitamin bottles, as well as the spices. I like them because I was able to free up some cupboard space.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best deal ever!
customer_reviews.text: So so amazing!!! These work FANTASTIC! Don't plan on using them with square jars.. it's a little sketch, the McCormick spices fit best, but these stick on hooks are amazing. It comes with screws but you don't need them. My hooks were delivered a couple of hours ago, I just got all my spices up and then I literally ordered more right away for my medications. This is AWESOME!!! Love!
customer_reviews.author: Kay-Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing and finding spices
customer_reviews.text: Really like these so far. Let them set before adding spices and have had no issues with them falling off. I do not use them for the heavy glass bottles, but mostly for the small ones and they are perfect to find what l want without digging all over the place!
customer_reviews.author: jld

customer_reviews.title: Works OK when nailed into cupboard
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for quite awhile now and I will say, don't even bother attempting to use the tape, just nail them in. We tried the tape and it worked great for 2-3 weeks but then we would open to cupboard and they would all fall on us. Also, not really for larger spices, so something to keep in mind if you buy in bulk like we tend to (I don't mean giant bottles but bigger than average).
customer_reviews.author: Ely's Mom

customer_reviews.title: not the solution I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: I put these up in my cabinet with the adhesive provided. Wish they were all one color because they look pretty tacky. Several of the bottles fall through it and I've had a few bottles break because of falling out. Was hoping this was a solution to a messy spice cabinet but it's not working for me.
customer_reviews.author: Recent Bride

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: LOVE them! So far they have been holding the spices wonderfully. At first I wasn't sure if they would hold spices that were the same circumference all the way around, but they have and they hasn't slipped a bit. After a lot of use I'm not sure if they will still have the same "holding" power, but thus far I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: It's been over a month and I have had no issues (yet) of the plastic coming off the tape...like some other buyers. I don't use a lot of spices when I cook, so they don't get pulled off much. There does seem to be some stretching on the ones I pull off every few days. So I'm not sure how long it's going to hold up. But...It's so nice to be able to get into my cupboard, without digging behind the spices to get to anything!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Jean

customer_reviews.title: These spice clips are great for putting my often used spices out on the ...
customer_reviews.text: These spice clips are great for putting my often used spices out on the cabinet for easy reach. I shared them with my daughter and they also liked them. Be sure to follow the instructions to clean the area very thoroughly before attaching them and then let them set for 24 hours before hanging your spices on them. If you don't they will unstick and fall off. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive option for saving space
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in an effort to create more cabinet space in a cottage with very little storage - they worked great! I was able to free up a whole shelf by moving the spices to the door. Added bonus is I can see exactly what I have without shuffling all the containers around. I waited the full 48 hours after mounting brackets before using them and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: My cupboards are too thin to use the screws so, I used the sticky strips. Within 2 days, they were falling off and I put my lightest spices in them. I followed the cleaning of the surface and installation instructions exactly. I would not recommend these unless you can screw them right into a surface.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Handy space saver
customer_reviews.text: Very handy, and can grip a variety of jars. I put them on the inside of the cabinet next to the stove to keep ridiculous used spices handy. One thing I recommend, if using the tape, is to make sure the surface you are adhering them to is clean (free of any oil, especially), and perfectly smooth. I've had mine up for months, and have had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Lulubeans

customer_reviews.title: These DO NOT stick.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. I have had these installed for about a month and they are already falling off. The adhesive does not stick for very long. And, of course, I'm past my return period. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: DB8423

customer_reviews.title: Perfect with Command Strips
customer_reviews.text: These things are perfect. They hold most sizes of spice jars. After reading the reviews, I decided to hang them with large hook command strips instead of just the tape strip they came with. My cabinets are not solid wood so I could not use the screws. The command strips (2.39 a pack at target) worked perfectly! I put one on each end, stuck them to the cupboard door, let them sit for a couple of hours, then put all of the spices in. They haven't fallen off yet after 24 hours. I think if you hang them right, they're amazing. I might buy another set.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Ah-mazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Just put them up and can't believe how much easier it is to get at my spices 👌 I used command strips on the backs instead just to make sure I could take them off without having any residue behind or having to use screws. So far - I'm really happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: OK, use smaller plastic bottles
customer_reviews.text: This produce was "OK", I got the idea of it, but the holders just did not hold the larger glass bottles that I have up well. The plastic one's held ok, sometimes they fell off when I shut the door. I would recommend this for the smaller plastic bottles and I don't think you would have a problem. I would like to see the company come out with the exact size empty bottles to purchase along with it so it would work better.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Di Cenzo

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery and I like the option of being able to screw it down ...
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and I like the option of being able to screw it down as well as the normal adhesive that comes with it. Glass bottles are heavier and this gives me the assurance that the racks will stay in place. Very versatile and helped me maximize and better organize my cabinet space. No more duplication of herbs and spices.
customer_reviews.author: D. L.

customer_reviews.title: don't moubt inside a door
customer_reviews.text: My spices fitted into these holders very well. A word of warning, do mot mount them inside a door as my spices keep falling and smashing on the counter
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Clark

customer_reviews.title: Love this! We didn't use the screws and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! We didn't use the screws and the adhesive strips that came with it have been holding up just great. A must have for people with a shortage of cabinets. Just make sure you plan where you put them so that the cabinets will close with the spices in them. A great bargain if you ask me! Would buy again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: ZBBFAN1980

customer_reviews.title: Completely useless. The plastic stretches out after 3-4 uses & ...
customer_reviews.text: Completely useless. The plastic stretches out after 3-4 uses & then your spice bottles fall. Seems to work great at first, but that lasts maybe a week assuming you actually use your spice jars.
customer_reviews.author: pmurti

customer_reviews.title: Deco Spice holders
customer_reviews.text: We love them and plan to order another set. We glued (used gorilla glue) magnets to the back of each one. They hold our spices very well and are kept on the side of the fridge. We can easily access them when cooking (cook many things from scratch), and know when we are out of something. We elected not to use the sticky tape as we didn't feel that would hold up to our regular use. Additionally the spice holders are movable having a magnet stuck to the back of the holder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These spice grippers simply do not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: These spice grippers do not work at all. The strips adhere fine to my cupboard door. I was so excited when I got them because I thought they would be so handy. However the grippers expand and the Spice jars fall out every time I close the cupboard even as I close it very softly.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie J. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: I have since secured them to the cabinet wall with the screws and they work just fine. I really do like the grip on the ...
customer_reviews.text: They stuck ok for a few weeks. I think the weather in Florida, high humidity and temps, may have had something to do with that. I have since secured them to the cabinet wall with the screws and they work just fine. I really do like the grip on the bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bailey

customer_reviews.title: I love these gripper clips
customer_reviews.text: I love these gripper clips! Works perfect to hold all my spices in my cabinet, sticks well, and most spice bottles fit into them. I had a strip left over and actually used them to hand my scarves on in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: The clips come with a good 3M tape strip in the back plus small screws
customer_reviews.text: I just put this up today I hope they last. The clips come with a good 3M tape strip in the back plus small screws. The screws aren't small enough for the cabinets it will go true the cabinets woods that why I don't give the 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This product works great on the cabinet doors. Some of the bottles I have won't stay in because tops are too small.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Kalua

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: After a month my spices started falling on the floor and breaking!!! The plastic clips are not strong enough to keep their gripping power!!! Don't buy these for glass jars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Knie

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver and hold spices securely in travel
customer_reviews.text: Got these for our RV. Great space saver and hold spices securely in travel. Most plastic spice jars from grocery store fit nicely but some glass jars are a bit to big for the holder.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Got exactly what I ordered and expected. These can be separated to fit size of cabinet doors and they will hold small rectangular spice containers if placed near top lip of container. needed the extra room for my Keurig cups!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great grippers!
customer_reviews.text: These little grippers work pretty great! However trying to fit too large of a seasoning container in the gripper does not work out well. Stick to the shakers that are medium size. Oh and the adhesive tape on the back works very well! I will most likely get more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for the first few weeks
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the first few weeks, then one row started to peel off. We corrected this by purchasing some Command Strips. Holds all my spice bottles beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a college student who likes to cook!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a college student who likes to cook! I just used a few command strips to hang these up on the inside of my cabinet door, and it opened up my storage exponentially. Great product that is easy to use and WORKS. My mom came to visit and told me that she wants to get some for herself!
customer_reviews.author: ggheck

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but...
customer_reviews.text: Great idea! But the loose grip after a few months. The more you use them, the more they get loose. None of them has broken yet, but eventually I think that's what going to happen. Beside that, it's a great idea to keep space in your cabinet!
customer_reviews.author: MARIA A PROSPERI C

customer_reviews.title: Great idea for organizing spices
customer_reviews.text: Great idea for organizing spices, but we ended up screwing them into the cabinet wall because they would not stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Ohlde

customer_reviews.title: I can't because my cabinet door is like paper. If they stayed up I'd love them
customer_reviews.text: ****Addendum, I received a refund. I assume it was because of my review. So, that was nice. Several of them keep falling down. I suggest screwing them on. I cans because my cabinet door is like paper. If they stayed up I'd love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jen R.

customer_reviews.title: Product worked as it should, I now have more ...
customer_reviews.text: Product worked as it should, I now have more space in my cabinet for more junk !! Handy item !!
customer_reviews.author: Daryl M.

customer_reviews.title: Spice Holder Gives More Cupboard Space
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about these adhering or not holding the spices, but I LOVE them. It freed up so much space in my cupboard. However, spices that are larger or straight neck on the bottle (like my lemon pepper or Lawrys) don't fit. I would still buy these again if I move. I wish they came in one color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Installed and waited the few days to cure. Insert spice jars and within a week the plastic had stretched out and jars fall off the door. I have already broken 2 spice jars in a matter or two days. Buy this if you want to put costly spices in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L.

customer_reviews.title: 2 strips not sticking very well but think I can ...
customer_reviews.text: 2 strips not sticking very well but think I can purchase some two way tape to help it out because it looks nice
customer_reviews.author: faithful1$

customer_reviews.title: I Love the fact that these can be cut to size ...
customer_reviews.text: I Love the fact that these can be cut to size (they come with 5 clips joined) but really hate that it's the different colors..which I did know when I was buying the product but I really wanted deco brothers because they have great products that I can rely on
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mama

customer_reviews.title: Product fell off.
customer_reviews.text: Followed directions but all the racks fell off after a couple weeks. Adhesive is just mounting tape and it is not effective. Poor product.
customer_reviews.author: Old Painless

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: My partner and I love the spice clipper grip strip! It came on time and the product was super easy to install. The distributor was courteous as well, they had thorough instructions on how to install and had attached a cleaning wipe for convenience. It's been about four days since it was installed and no peeling or falls. Granted most of our spice bottles are plastic. These grips are working for us thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Clips
customer_reviews.text: Really help in getting more space in our kitchen cabinets. Easy to put up too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Manthey

customer_reviews.title: Liked this so much when we first got
customer_reviews.text: Liked this so much when we first got. It that I ordered a second. But over time (a month or two, not years) the clips stretch out, and everything starts falling down/out. Really bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Glass jars will absolutely fall out
customer_reviews.text: These absolutely aren't suitable for glass spice jars - after a month or so they start falling out. If you only have plastic jars and ideally the necked in type as McCormick sells then they work fine - otherwise you will at some point be sweeping glass and spices up from you kitchen floor...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont get this if you have glass jars period!
customer_reviews.text: They worked really well for about 2 weeks and then they simply wouldn't hole the jars in place any more unless they were very small plastic ones or the ones that are plastic and indented near the top half of the spaces on mine are now empty and totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Put these up about two weeks ago with just the ...
customer_reviews.text: Put these up about two weeks ago with just the tape. So far they have held. I will echo other reviewers that the clips hold the shape of the first bottle so if you use a big jar, the clip won't hold a small one after that.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Moderately pleased
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. I'm giving it 3 stars because I found the arms didn't grip the spice jars very well. My fix for that was to adhere Gorilla tape strips inside the arms. Now they grip the jars and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these for my McCormick spices. They hold the glass spices well, too. Mine are adhered with just the sticky back, not the nails that were provided (since they are on a cabinet door). Just purchased them for my mom, too!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen from Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Stable, no
customer_reviews.text: Held spices, but does not stay sicky to hold on cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Comstore Card

customer_reviews.title: I am happy. Just remeber that the clips WILL get fatigued
customer_reviews.text: I am happy. Just remeber that the clips WILL get fatigued. If you put the same container in the same place you will be fine. But these clips stretch and stay. If you try to put a different container in a clip, it wont hold.
customer_reviews.author: stever68A

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought them
customer_reviews.text: Did end up having to use the screws provided as it was pulling away from the door. Perhaps it would have been better to separate them into into individuals? Some of my spices slide down lower than I place then but none have fallen. Wish they were all the same color.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Porto

customer_reviews.title: Holds the spices very well.
customer_reviews.text: Product works great! Love it. Holds regular McCormick spice containers as well as the glass McCormick organic containers. Hung them on the refrigerator which is about one foot away from my stove. Now my spices are always at arms reach when I'm cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Eh....
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product and concept, followed directions exactly for the adhesive/tape mount but after 2 weeks, 2 strips fell off. With newer cabinets being fairly thin, the screw mounts are not really an option.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy354

customer_reviews.title: Very nice if you have a small kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Very nice if you have a small kitchen. I used the sticky pads and waited the 48 hours before I put spices in the rings, they are holding up very well, no sagging or peeling.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome!! My spice cabinet is no longer a mess with spices falling out at me when I open it or when I'm searching for a spice I need that's hidden among the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Rosalba

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Space Saver!
customer_reviews.text: These things are an awesome space saver! We had them up in no time with the provided screws. So far I have had no problems and will update at a later time if any issues arise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A miss
customer_reviews.text: Important to know that this is probably only appropriate for bottles with a 'neck' rather than straight up and down cylinders. We have many of the latter type and they all fell within a day. Sigh. The quest for spice organization continues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I imagine this would be fine for slimmer plastic containers
customer_reviews.text: Not suitable for all containers. I have glass jars that cause the plastic to stretch a little, and now they don't hold and jars fall out. I imagine this would be fine for slimmer plastic containers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Space galore!
customer_reviews.text: Just finished clearing out an entire shelf of spices by hanging them on the back of the pantry door. Love this! No more forgetting what we have on hand as everything is in plain sight. Definitely would purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Becky J Barrow

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money as far as I'm concerned. Once a jar is placed in a clip, the clip does not return to its original shape/size when the jar is removed ... I don't expect these to last very long ... Just sorry I've got them taped to the inside doors on my cabinets. I'm sure it'll be a mess when I have to peel them off. Update 6/26/16 -- Now the jars won't stay in the clips at all .. once they are sprung open, they won't return to their original shape and the slightest touch causes the jars to fall ... What a mess now getting them all taken down and replacing them with something better.
customer_reviews.author: p1mkw

customer_reviews.title: I loved it until one glass spice container fell
customer_reviews.text: I loved it until one glass spice container fell. The material is not strong enough to hold tight the container so they slip
customer_reviews.author: Lilian

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Followed the instructions and the sticky tape on the back still didn't hold. I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: This guy

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because of the adhesive option. The adhesive, even following the directions, does not hold up. I have had most of my spices come crashing down from my above-head cupboards!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle N Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: We tried to use the adhesive side instead of screwing them into our cabinets. Only held up for a day and then fell off.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney C

customer_reviews.title: I received a ton of spice holders in the pack ...
customer_reviews.text: I received a ton of spice holders in the pack and it was more than I needed so I plan on sharing with a friend! They arrived duper fast and the tape they use sticks very well if you clean the surface before installation and also if the tape doesn't work for you then you can use the screws that are included.
customer_reviews.author: Heather O.

customer_reviews.title: Great for what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Great for what I wanted. I used 3m velcro like someone else suggested and so far so good. Note that it really only seems to fit the standard size spice bottles, not the large ones or the tiny ones.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: there junk don't waste your time and
customer_reviews.text: These clips worked for about a week then the spice jars started falling off, there junk don't waste your time and money
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Wein

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The glue does not hold up. Great idea, terrible product. I'm using Velcro circles instead and it's working wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Wawi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel trailer
customer_reviews.text: I put these in the drawer (screwed them to heavy cardboard the same size as the drawer) so my spices don't move around in travel trailer. A great solution!
customer_reviews.author: S. Pikul

product_meta.title: DecoBros 30 Spice Gripper Clips Strips Cabinet Holder - 6 Strips, Holds 30 Jars
product_meta.description: DecoBros 6 pack Spice Gripper Clip Strips is best way to save your space and get all spice jars organized.
feature_bullets: Include 6 strips (color: 2 Black / 2 White / 2 Red), each strip has 5 clips with pre-applied strength double-sided bonding tapes.
Additional screws included for extra secured
Strips can be tailored to fit your space, get your spice bottles organized like spice rack does
Easy to apply on cabinet door, wall or refrigerator
Fits most standard round containers from 1.5" ~ 1.75" diameter

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars877 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
